content:
Getting

 Error: /etc/apt/sources.list contains a cdrom source; not installing.  Use 'allowcdrom' to override this failure.
    Error: /Stage[main]/Zulip::Base/Package[ntp]/ensure: change from purged to present failed: /etc/apt/sources.list contains a cdrom source; not installing.  Use 'allowcdrom' to override this failure.
    Error: /etc/apt/sources.list contains a cdrom source; not installing.  Use 'allowcdrom' to override this failure.
    Error: /Stage[main]/Zulip::Base/Package[netcat]/ensure: change from purged to present failed: /etc/apt/sources.list contains a cdrom source; not installing.  Use 'allowcdrom' to override this failure.
    Error: /etc/apt/sources.list contains a cdrom source; not installing.  Use 'allowcdrom' to override this failure.
    Error: /Stage[main]/Zulip::Base/Package[nagios-plugins-basic]/ensure: change from purged to present failed: /etc/apt/sources.list contains a cdrom source; not installing.  Use 'allowcdrom' to override this failure.
    Error: /etc/apt/sources.list contains a cdrom source; not installing.  Use 'allowcdrom' to override this failure.
    Error: /Stage[main]/Zulip::Base/Package[moreutils]/ensure: change from purged to present failed: /etc/apt/sources.list contains a cdrom source; not installing.  Use 'allowcdrom' to override this failure.

When running the install script on debian 9.5
seems to be related to puppet or something?
That's I think not a zulip issue... just your apt configuration expecting a cdrom that is no longer present
